original_context: Eric does not hold conservative views.
All politicians who seek progress make decisions and lead nations.
If Eric backs enterprise, then he seeks progress and values stability.
Eric either supports the free market or backs enterprise.
Eric either pursues power or serves people.
Eric either seeks equality or pursues power, but not both.
Eric either favors order or seeks equality, but not both.
All politicians who back family and favor order promote traditional values.
If Eric either promotes traditional values or champions individual freedom (but not both), then he holds conservative views.
For all politicians, if a politician champions individual freedom and supports the free market, then they identify as a rightist.

rules.text: All politicians who seek progress make decisions and lead nations.

Eric either pursues power or serves people.
Eric either seeks equality or pursues power, but not both.
Eric either favors order or seeks equality, but not both.
All politicians who back family and favor order promote traditional values.
